message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You started high, I'll try to negotiate!
You went up, I'll meet you halfway!
You met me halfway, I'll try to push it up a bit more!
You went up again, I'll meet you at the 3/5 mark!
You met me at 3/5, I'll try to get closer to 4/5!
You're getting close to 3/4, I'll meet you at 1/3 and 2/3!
You met me at 1/3 and 2/3, I'll try to get the majority!
You're getting close to 4/5, I'll meet you at 1/2 and 1/2!
